Justin Gregory Smith (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 8, 1978), nkè a maara dịka Just Blaze, bụ onye America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ hip hop na DJ

A mụrụ ya na Paterson, New Jersey, Blaze gàrà Mahadum Rutgers ruo afọ atọ tupu ọ kwụsị iji chụsoo ọrụ egwu ya. Aha egwu ya sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke Blaze Fielding sitere na usoro egwuregwu vidio Streets of Rage. Blaze nwetara nkwado dị ka ónyé na-emepụta Roc-A-Fella Records na mbido afọ 2000, na-ebute ụzọ n'ụdị nnwale "chipmunk soul" nke a ma ama na mbido ruo n'etiti afọ 2000 nke hip-hop. Ọ pụtara na vidiyo maka egwu nke atọ site na album Eminem nke 2010 Recovery nke akpọrọ "No Love", nkè o mepụtara
Blaze bụkwa onye isi oche nke Fort Knocks Entertainment. O dekwara ụdaolu maka egwuregwu vidio, ọ bụkwa ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri na NBA Street Vol
Ọbọdọ nna ya nke Paterson sọpụrụ ya na Julaị 2018 site na igodo màkà obodo ahụ iji kwado "onyinye ọdịbendị pụrụ iche" ya na obodo ahụ.
